member.name: M:Talegen.Storage.Net.AzureBlobs.AzureBlobStorageService.CreateDirectory(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: This method is used to create a temporary directory within the Inspire application path.
member.param: Contains a sub-folder that will be included in the working directory path.
Contains a value indicating whether the method is silently return successfully if the folder path already exists.
member.returns: Returns the name of the directory that was created.
member.exception: This exception is thrown if the directory is unable to be created.

member.name: M:Talegen.Storage.Net.AzureBlobs.AzureBlobStorageService.DeleteDirectory(System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: This method is used to delete a sub-folder directory and all of its files.
member.param: Contains the sub-folder name of the directory off the root working folder that will be deleted.
Delete all contents within the folder.
Contains a value indicating whether an exception is thrown if the target folder does not exist. Default is true; no exception is thrown if the folder does not exist.
member.exception: This exception is thrown if the directory is unable to be deleted.

member.name: M:Talegen.Storage.Net.AzureBlobs.AzureBlobStorageService.EmptyDirectory(System.String)
member.summary: This method is used to delete all directories and files inside of a sub-folder within the specified workspace root path, however the folder is left in place empty.
member.param: Contains the sub-folder within the within the specified workspace root path to empty.

member.name: M:Talegen.Storage.Net.AzureBlobs.AzureBlobStorageService.ReadBinaryFile(System.String)
member.summary: This method is used to read all the bytes from a binary file.
member.param: Contains the path to the file to load and return.
member.returns: Returns a byte array containing the binary bytes of the target file.

member.name: M:Talegen.Storage.Net.AzureBlobs.AzureBlobStorageService.ReadBinaryFile(System.String,System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: This method is used to read all the bytes from a binary file to a provided stream.
member.param: Contains the path to the file to load into the stream.
The stream to write the file to.

member.name: M:Talegen.Storage.Net.AzureBlobs.AzureBlobStorageService.ReadTextFile(System.String,System.Text.Encoding)
member.summary: This method is used to read all the bytes from a text file.
member.param: Contains the path to the file to load and return.
Contains the text encoding type. If none is specified, Encoding.Default is used.
member.returns: Returns a string containing the content of the target file.

member.name: M:Talegen.Storage.Net.AzureBlobs.AzureBlobStorageService.WriteBinaryFile(System.String,System.Byte[])
member.summary: This method is used to write content to the specified path.
member.param: Contains the fully qualified path, including file name, to the location in which the binary content shall be written.
Contains a byte array of the content to be written.
member.returns: Returns a value indicating whether the write was successful.

member.name: M:Talegen.Storage.Net.AzureBlobs.AzureBlobStorageService.WriteBinaryFile(System.String,System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: This method is used to write content to the specified path.
member.param: Contains the fully qualified path, including file name, to the location in which the binary content shall be written.
Contains a stream of the content to be written.
member.returns: Returns a value indicating whether the write was successful.

member.name: M:Talegen.Storage.Net.AzureBlobs.AzureBlobStorageService.WriteTextFile(System.String,System.String,System.Text.Encoding)
member.summary: This method is used to write content to the specified path.
member.param: Contains the fully qualified path, including file name, to the location in which the text content shall be written.
Contains a string of the content to be written.
Contains the text file encoding. If none specified, Encoding.Default is used.
member.returns: Returns a value indicating whether the write was successful.

member.name: M:Talegen.Storage.Net.AzureBlobs.AzureBlobStorageService.DeleteFile(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: This method is used to delete a file.
member.param: Contains a the path to the file that will be deleted.
Contains a value indicating whether the directory the file is within will be deleted. This will only occur if no other files remain in the directory after the list of files have been deleted.

member.name: M:Talegen.Storage.Net.AzureBlobs.AzureBlobStorageService.CopyFile(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: This method is used to copy a file.
member.param: Contains a the path to the file that will be copied.
Contains the path to the target where the file is to be copied.
Contains a value indicating if the target should be overwritten if it already exists. Default is true.

member.name: M:Talegen.Storage.Net.AzureBlobs.AzureBlobStorageService.MoveFile(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: This method is used to move a file.
member.param: Contains a the path to the file that will be moved.
Contains the path to the target where the file is to be moved.
Contains a value indicating if the target should be overwritten if it already exists. Default is true.

member.name: M:Talegen.Storage.Net.AzureBlobs.AzureBlobStorageService.FileHash(System.String)
member.summary: This method is used to create a hash of the file contents.
member.param: The path to the file.
member.returns: Returns a hash of the file contents.

member.name: M:Talegen.Storage.Net.AzureBlobs.AzureBlobStorageService.FindFiles(System.String,System.String,System.IO.SearchOption)
member.summary: This method is used to get the files from a directory.
member.param: Contains the directory name to get the files.
Contains an optional file name search pattern. If not specified, *.* is used.
Contains search options. If not specified, all sub-folders are searched for the file pattern.
member.returns: Returns a list of files in the directory path.

member.summary: Verifies the directory name root path.
member.param: Name of the sub folder to verify.
member.exception: An exception is thrown if the root folder specified in is not rooted with workspace root folder path.

member.summary: Laterals the copy internal.

The dest file path.
Contains a value indicating if the target should be overwritten if it already exists.
member.returns: Returns a value indicating copy success.

member.summary: Finds the files internal.

member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:Talegen.Storage.Net.AzureBlobs.Properties.Resources.ExceptionErrorText
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to An internal unhandled error occurred. The message reported was "{0}"..

member.name: P:Talegen.Storage.Net.AzureBlobs.Properties.Resources.RequestFailedErrorText
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The request has failed. The message was "{0}"..

member.name: P:Talegen.Storage.Net.AzureBlobs.Properties.Resources.StorageAccessDeniedErrorText
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The path "{0}" could not be accessed due to permissions. See "{1}".

member.name: P:Talegen.Storage.Net.AzureBlobs.Properties.Resources.StorageDirectoryCommandErrorText
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The storage folder "{0}" command could not be completed due to "{1}".

member.name: P:Talegen.Storage.Net.AzureBlobs.Properties.Resources.StorageDirectoryDoesNotExistErrorText
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The storage folder "{0}" does not exist..

member.name: P:Talegen.Storage.Net.AzureBlobs.Properties.Resources.StorageDirectoryExistsErrorText
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The storage folder"{0}" already exists..

member.name: P:Talegen.Storage.Net.AzureBlobs.Properties.Resources.StorageNotFoundErrorText
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The storage path "{0}" was not found..

member.name: P:Talegen.Storage.Net.AzureBlobs.Properties.Resources.StoragePathSpecifiedNotInRootErrorText
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The path specified in "{0}" did not match the root path "{1}". All folders must be created under the root path..

member.name: P:Talegen.Storage.Net.AzureBlobs.Properties.Resources.StorageZipFilesNotFoundErrorText
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The archive file was not created because one or more files to archive were not found..

member.name: P:Talegen.Storage.Net.AzureBlobs.Properties.Resources.StreamReadErrorText
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The provided stream cannot be read..

member.name: P:Talegen.Storage.Net.AzureBlobs.Properties.Resources.StreamWriteErrorText
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The provided stream cannot be written to..
